title: 关于盔甲架的Equipment标签为啥没效果
author: lxc0123
txt_content:
如题我为了弄一个盔甲架
为了给他戴上盔甲
以下是命令，其中实在是找不到哪里出现了错误，请人帮忙
我改过标签好几次，都是不行
summon ArmorStand ~ ~+1 ~ {CustomName:soldiers,CustomNameVisible:1,NoGravity:1,NoBasePlate:1,ShowArms:1,DisabledSlots:31,Pose:{Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,360.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,360.0F]},Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:air",Count:0b},{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:iron_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:3s}]}复制代码


（可能查错误很累）

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
你的游戏版本是多少...大于1.9就改动了！
Equipment分别被HandItems和ArmorItems代替了
大概就是这样的：
summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"soldiers",CustomNameVisible:1b,NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,ShowArms:1b,DisabledSlots:31,Pose:{Head:[0.0f,0.0f,0.0f],Body:[0.0f,0.0f,0.0f],LeftArm:[0.0f,0.0f,360.0f],RightArm:[0.0f,0.0f,360.0f]},ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:3s}]}复制代码mdzz哪天把触控板拆了吧
